@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Each object, which should be managed by a {@link RadioGroup} have to
implement this interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the item was checked or unchecked

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set whether the item is checked

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean} whether the item should be checked
@param.description: whether the item should be checked

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get whether the item is checked

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the radiogroup, which manages this item

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
value {qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} The radiogroup, which should
manage the item.
@param.description:
The radiogroup, which should
manage the item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the radiogroup, which manages this item

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} The radiogroup, which manages the item.
@return.description: The radiogroup, which manages the item.
